credit_opinion.summary: Playtech presents a complex credit picture. On the positive side: NET CASH of $200m, low total debt ($350m), bond above par (100.96), $1.1bn market cap equity cushion, and strong CFFO ($269m). However, EBITDA has collapsed 87% YoY and is now NEGATIVE at -$11m LTM - a dramatic deterioration from $311m in 2022. The Mar 2026 maturity ($398m) is approaching and will need refinancing despite negative EBITDA. Evolution lawsuit adds legal risk. LatAm regulatory headwinds. The elevated distress score of 17 reflects these operational challenges despite strong liquidity.
key_risks: EBITDA collapsed to NEGATIVE -$11m LTM (was $311m in 2022)
